items.title: Destiny Trail ~ Tower of the Past
Tower of the Present ~ Tower of the Future
Is this a good starting point for the series?
I can't clear the main story!
What should I do after clearing the main story?
Upgrade value, staff uses, pot capacity
Transient Staff + "Switch places with your target"
Fixer Scroll + Mnster House Scrl + Expulsion or Night-Day
Only weapons and shields on the ground (1 floor, 3 floors)
Only grass on the ground (3 floors)
Only scrolls on the ground (1 floor, 3 floors)
Only pots on the ground (1 floor, 3 floors)

HP doesn't regenerate, and lots of traps (2 floors, 4 floors)
